title: Bug 101187: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: If the localization key is left blank when adding, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: When the key is left blank in the properties file, but it has a valid value, the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the properties file.
2. Leave the localization key blank while adding a new entry.
3. Check if the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
